About

I'm Barry Pitman, and this is my software development blog! I've been working as a software developer at Ubiquitech since 2010. I mostly work on Java web applications, but also double up as a DBA, sysadmin, and front-end developer (jack of all trades - master of none!).

I'm living in Brussels, Belgium with my wife, but grew up in South Africa.
